name: Famous Age Quote-s - Famous & Inspiring Quotes on Age
name_original: Famous Age Quote-s - Famous & Inspiring Quotes on Age
description:
Famous Age Quotes is a collection of over 700 quotes on age from celebrities to presidents to successful businesspeople. The easy to use app gives you insight from the most celebrated people in history! Gain knowledge and become a little wiser with each quote!

People are LOVING these AWESOME features!
* Shake the phone or tap the button for new quotes!
* Save your favorites for later!
* Easy to share quotes with friends!
* Unlock 3 more packs for a total of over 700 quotes!
* Beautiful and simple. Designed for iOS 7!

Download it today! It's free!
